name: Mimis Comfy Cooking
description:
You play as Mimi Applegate a young aspiring chef trying to follow in her grandmother's footsteps. Taking out an extremely strict loan to start a restaurant. With the extensive knowledge and delicious recipes handed down from your beloved grandmother, you will show the world what you can do!

Cook, Fry and Bake your way through each level!
Refreshments can be bought and given for extra time and money.
Customers will enter the restaurant requesting a random item from the menu.
Cook fast, they can become unhappy and leave!
Turn on "Extra HUD Info" if you need more info on each table and customer.
You must pay off a part of your loan by the end of the week, make sure to save!

(Default Controls)

-"WASD" Movement

-"Spacebar" Jump

-"F" / "Left Click" Interact

-"X" / "Right Click" Drop

-"U" Speed up Time

-"Left Alt" Extra HUD Info



If the web player is giving you performance issues try the application.
if you find any bugs or issues please let me know :)

Thank you for taking the time to play/browse this game!

Current Version : 1.0
